longBusinessSummary: Whirlpool of India Limited manufactures and markets home appliances in India and internationally. It offers refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, microwave ovens, dishwasher, kitchen, built-in, and small appliances. The company was incorporated in 1960 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India. Whirlpool of India Limited operates as a subsidiary of Whirlpool Corporation.
